data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Faetano, San Marino a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Faetano, San Marino
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Faetano.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Faetano you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Faetano, San Marino into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Faetano, San Marino to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Faetano, San Marino.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Faetano, San Marino honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
